originalText.text: Alvina is a true professional who always takes perfect care of my skin. She has top-of-the-line technology and products and is very knowledgeable about how to reduce, prevent, and clear acne. She targets my skincare needs so well and I always leave feeling refreshed and glowing!

text.text: Alvina is a true professional who always takes perfect care of my skin. She has top-of-the-line technology and products and is very knowledgeable about how to reduce, prevent, and clear acne. She targets my skincare needs so well and I always leave feeling refreshed and glowing!

originalText.text: Alvina is very knowledgeable and kind. She is an expert on anti-aging skin treatments and I feel very fortunate to have her care for my skin. I have a package of laser genesis and secret RF micro needling treatments

text.text: Alvina is very knowledgeable and kind. She is an expert on anti-aging skin treatments and I feel very fortunate to have her care for my skin. I have a package of laser genesis and secret RF micro needling treatments

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Alvina since April 2023. I initially went for laser hair removal but had such a positive experience I also tried Sculpsure and Trusculpt. The place is small which I quite like and exceptionally clean. Alvina is warm, kind and knowledgeable. She takes the extra time to really get to know her clients and remembers all the little details. In the 5 months I’ve known her, she’s gone the extra mile to squeeze me in if I need a last minute appointment or if my schedule changes. She’s generous and has offered me great prices on packages that fit my needs. She makes you feel like family and I look forward to continuing treatment there and trying new things under her care. Thanks for everything Alvina, you’ve truly been wonderful!!

originalText.text:
This place is warm, friendly and clean.
I’ve been having Lasar Genesis for a few years with Alvina.  She’s kind, sweet and accommodating with appointments.
Thank you Alvina!

originalText.text: Had a great experience with Alvina at Lenox Hill Laser Esthetic. I wasn’t sure where to go at first but found her online, and I’m new to these types of treatments. Even so, she was able to schedule me almost immediately for a consultation and first session. She helped ease my anxiety as well, and was very professional still in the process. She talked through the procedure before we started and made sure I understood what she was doing which I really appreciate. I highly recommend LHLE.
